plant_accumulation.issue: too many plants introduced in first episode

balance_recommendations.recommendation: Redistribute plants from episode_01 to episodes 2-3
balance_recommendations.reason: Episode_01 has too many plants (17) which may overwhelm audience. Move 5-7 plants to later episodes for better pacing.

balance_recommendations.recommendation: Add reminder plants for plant_001 and plant_004
balance_recommendations.reason: These major plants wait 4-5 episodes for payoff. Add subtle reminders in episodes 3 and 4 respectively to keep them in audience awareness.
Episodes 3-5 each have 4 payoffs. Consider moving 1-2 payoffs to episode_06 for more balanced distribution.

overall_timeline_health.assessment: Good overall structure with strong plant/payoff connections, but suffers from front-loaded plant introduction in episode_01 and moderate payoff clustering in middle episodes.
